languages.text: "Так подойди поближе и отведай его! Или боишься обжечься?" {n}Удар проходит сквозь экран, не причиняя ему видимого вреда. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your attack passes straight through the screen without doing any visible damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так подойди поближе и отведай его! Или боишься обжечься?" {n}Удар проходит сквозь экран, не причиняя ему видимого вреда. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

{n}Energies of the warp race toward Sargona, ready to tear every bone in his body out of its joints.{/n}

"Shoot that thing one more time and you'll be recaf!" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any visible damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your attack passes straight through the screen without doing any visible damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

languages.text: «¡Acércate y ven por él! ¿O te da miedo quemarte?». {n}Tu ataque atraviesa limpiamente la pantalla sin causar ningún daño apreciable. Sargona mira de soslayo uno de los generadores que hay a un lado, como si quisiera comprobar que sigue intacto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your attack passes straight through the screen without doing any visible damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Acércate y ven por él! ¿O te da miedo quemarte?». {n}Tu ataque atraviesa limpiamente la pantalla sin causar ningún daño apreciable. Sargona mira de soslayo uno de los generadores que hay a un lado, como si quisiera comprobar que sigue intacto.{/n}

languages.text: “不如你亲自过来尝尝吧！还是说，你害怕被烧成焦炭？”{n}你的攻击径自穿过了屏障，没能造成任何肉眼可见的伤害。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your attack passes straight through the screen without doing any visible damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不如你亲自过来尝尝吧！还是说，你害怕被烧成焦炭？”{n}你的攻击径自穿过了屏障，没能造成任何肉眼可见的伤害。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}
“再朝那玩意儿开一枪，你自己就要变成雷卡咖啡了！”{n}你的子弹径自穿过了屏障，没能造成任何肉眼可见的伤害。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}

languages.text: « Alors, approchez ! Venez voir de plus près ! À moins que vous ayez peur des brûlures ? » {n}Votre coup traverse l'écran sans la moindre trace de dégâts. Sargona lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'un des générateurs sur le côté, comme pour vérifier qu'il est toujours intact.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your attack passes straight through the screen without doing any visible damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Alors, approchez ! Venez voir de plus près ! À moins que vous ayez peur des brûlures ? » {n}Votre coup traverse l'écran sans la moindre trace de dégâts. Sargona lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'un des générateurs sur le côté, comme pour vérifier qu'il est toujours intact.{/n}

languages.text: 「ならば近くに来て味わってみろ！それとも、焼かれるのが怖いのか？」{n}あなたの攻撃はスクリーンをすり抜け、目に見えるダメージを与えることはなかった。サルゴナは横にある発生装置のひとつに素早く視線を向け、まだ無事かどうかを確かめるかのような様子を見せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your attack passes straight through the screen without doing any visible damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ならば近くに来て味わってみろ！それとも、焼かれるのが怖いのか？」{n}あなたの攻撃はスクリーンをすり抜け、目に見えるダメージを与えることはなかった。サルゴナは横にある発生装置のひとつに素早く視線を向け、まだ無事かどうかを確かめるかのような様子を見せた。{/n}

languages.text: "Öyleyse yaklaş da tadına bak! Yoksa yanmaktan mı korkuyorsun?" {n}Saldırın, herhangi bir görünür hasar meydana getirmeden ekranın içinden geçip gidiyor. Sargona, sanki hâlâ sağlam olup olmadığını kontrol ediyormuş gibi yan taraftaki jeneratörlerden birine hızla göz atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your attack passes straight through the screen without doing any visible damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse yaklaş da tadına bak! Yoksa yanmaktan mı korkuyorsun?" {n}Saldırın, herhangi bir görünür hasar meydana getirmeden ekranın içinden geçip gidiyor. Sargona, sanki hâlâ sağlam olup olmadığını kontrol ediyormuş gibi yan taraftaki jeneratörlerden birine hızla göz atıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "Dann tretet näher und probiert davon! Oder habt Ihr Angst, Euch zu verbrennen?" {n}Dein Angriff durchdringt den Bildschirm, ohne irgendeinen sichtbaren Schaden zu verursachen. Sargona wirft einen kurzen Blick auf einen der Generatoren an der Seite, als wolle er überprüfen, ob er noch intakt ist.{/n}
